comment: The topology of the symmetric group on ` A ` . This component is defined on a larger set than the true base - the product topology is defined on the set of all functions, not just bijections - but the definition of ` TopOpen ` ensures that it is trimmed down before it gets use. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Aug-2015.)
